name: Livefire
description:
A game created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46.  The theme was "Keep It Alive".

In this game you control falling blocks with the goal of keeping your campfire alive.  If your fire goes out you lose.  You can also lose if your fire goes over the top line.

Kindling will catch fire faster, but won't burn as long.

Logs will take longer to catch fire, but will burn longer than kindling.

Water will extinguish all fire directly below it.

There are 10 levels, increasing the speed at which blocks drop every 1 minute.

Controls: 

Press the Up Arrow to spin your block.

Press the Z/X button to pause and/or to view a small guide
